page.title: 02HOME LIFE IN DIPTON
page.content: A DAY AT THE SEASIDE by{LEE QUARZI. I love to go to{Whitley Bay}with my family.We prepare our food the night before.It takes 45 mins.to get there.On arrival, we go to the beach where I build sandcastles,swim in the{ {North Sea,}and collect shells. Later we have{fish and chips,}and go to the { {Spanish City Fair.}My Dad and I have rides on The Ghost Train,Carousel,and my favourite,The Waltzer.My Mam will not go on The Dodgems but I do. Finally we buy some{Candy Floss}and{Candy {Rock.}We go home at 7.30 pm.and on our journey, we travel through the{Tyne {Tunnel.} When we get home, my Mam makes us supper before we go upstairs to bed.
